tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE citizenship_applications (
    application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_name VARCHAR(255),
    applicant_age INT,
    application_status VARCHAR(50),
    review_stage VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE citizenship_applications (
    application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_name VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20),
    review_stage VARCHAR(20),
    submission_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE review_comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    application_id INT,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    comment TEXT,
    comment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (application_id) REFERENCES citizenship_applications(application_id)
);

CREATE TABLE document_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    application_id INT,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
    review_date DATE,
    review_comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE application_review (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  application_id INT,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
  review_date DATE,
  review_comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CitizenshipApplications (
  application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  applicant_name VARCHAR(255),
  application_status VARCHAR(50),
  submitted_date DATE,
  review_stage INT
);

CREATE TABLE ApplicationReview (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  application_id INT,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
  review_date DATE,
  review_result VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ApplicationHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  application_id INT,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  event_description TEXT,
  event_date DATE
);
